00008 // A detector which joins E2Collectors over consecutive lanes (backward)

00041 // ===========================================================================

00044 MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes::MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes(const std::string& id,
00045         DetectorUsage usage,
00046         MSLane* lane,
00047         SUMOReal startPos,
00048         SUMOTime haltingTimeThreshold,
00049         SUMOReal haltingSpeedThreshold,
00050         SUMOReal jamDistThreshold)
00051     : MSDetectorFileOutput(id),
00052       startPosM(startPos), haltingTimeThresholdM(haltingTimeThreshold),
00053       haltingSpeedThresholdM(haltingSpeedThreshold), jamDistThresholdM(jamDistThreshold),
00054       myID(id), myStartLaneID(lane->getID()), myUsage(usage) {}
00055 
00056 
00057 void
00058 MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes::init(MSLane* lane, SUMOReal detLength) {
00059     myLength = detLength;
00060     if (startPosM == 0) {
00061         startPosM = (SUMOReal) 0.1;
00062     }
00063     SUMOReal length = lane->getLength() - startPosM - (SUMOReal) 0.1;
00064     SUMOReal dlength = detLength;
00065     if (length > dlength) {
00066         length = dlength;
00067     }
00068     myLengths.push_back(length);
00069     myLaneCombinations.push_back(LaneVector());
00070     myLaneCombinations[0].push_back(lane);
00071     myDetectorCombinations.push_back(DetectorVector());
00072     MSE2Collector* c =
00073         buildCollector(0, 0, lane, startPosM, length);
00074     myDetectorCombinations[0].push_back(c);
00075     myAlreadyBuild[lane] = c;
00076     extendTo(detLength);
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes::~MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes() {}
00081 
00082 
00083 void
00084 MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes::extendTo(SUMOReal length) {
00085     bool done = false;
00086     while (!done) {
00087         done = true;
00088         LengthVector::iterator leni = myLengths.begin();
00089         LaneVectorVector::iterator lanei = myLaneCombinations.begin();
00090         DetectorVectorVector::iterator deti = myDetectorCombinations.begin();
00091         for (; leni != myLengths.end(); leni++, lanei++, deti++) {
00092             if ((*leni) < length) {
00093                 done = false;
00094                 // copy current values
00095                 LaneVector lv = *lanei;
00096                 DetectorVector dv = *deti;
00097                 SUMOReal clength = *leni;
00098                 assert(lv.size() > 0);
00099                 assert(dv.size() > 0);
00100                 // erase previous elements
00101                 assert(leni != myLengths.end());
00102                 myLengths.erase(leni);
00103                 myLaneCombinations.erase(lanei);
00104                 myDetectorCombinations.erase(deti);
00105                 // get the lane to look before
00106                 MSLane* toExtend = lv.back();
00107                 // and her predecessors
00108                 std::vector<MSLane*> predeccessors = getLanePredeccessorLanes(toExtend);
00109                 if (predeccessors.size() == 0) {
00110                     int off = 1;
00111                     MSEdge& e = toExtend->getEdge();
00112                     const std::vector<MSLane*> &lanes = e.getLanes();
00113                     int idx = (int) distance(lanes.begin(), find(lanes.begin(), lanes.end(), toExtend));
00114                     while (predeccessors.size() == 0) {
00115                         if (idx - off >= 0) {
00116                             MSLane* tryMe = lanes[idx - off];
00117                             predeccessors = getLanePredeccessorLanes(tryMe);
00118                         }
00119                         if (predeccessors.size() == 0 && idx + off < (int) lanes.size()) {
00120                             MSLane* tryMe = lanes[idx + off];
00121                             predeccessors = getLanePredeccessorLanes(tryMe);
00122                         }
00123                         off++;
00124                     }
00125                 }
00126 
00127                 /*                LaneContinuations::const_iterator conts =
00128                                     laneContinuations.find(toExtend->id());
00129                                 assert(conts!=laneContinuations.end());
00130                                 const std::vector<std::string> &predeccessors =
00131                                     (*conts).second;*/
00132                 // go through the predeccessors and extend the detector
00133                 for (std::vector<MSLane*>::const_iterator i = predeccessors.begin(); i != predeccessors.end(); i++) {
00134                     // get the lane
00135                     MSLane* l = *i;
00136                     // compute detector length
00137                     SUMOReal lanelen = length - clength;
00138                     if (lanelen > l->getLength()) {
00139                         lanelen = l->getLength() - (SUMOReal) 0.2;
00140                     }
00141                     // build new info
00142                     LaneVector nlv = lv;
00143                     nlv.push_back(l);
00144                     DetectorVector ndv = dv;
00145                     MSE2Collector* coll = 0;
00146                     if (myAlreadyBuild.find(l) == myAlreadyBuild.end()) {
00147                         coll = buildCollector(0, 0, l, (SUMOReal) 0.1, lanelen);
00148                     } else {
00149                         coll = myAlreadyBuild.find(l)->second;
00150                     }
00151                     myAlreadyBuild[l] = coll;
00152                     ndv.push_back(coll);
00153                     // store new info
00154                     myLaneCombinations.push_back(nlv);
00155                     myDetectorCombinations.push_back(ndv);
00156                     myLengths.push_back(clength + lanelen);
00157                 }
00158                 // restart
00159                 leni = myLengths.end() - 1;
00160             }
00161         }
00162     }
00163 }
00164 
00165 
00166 std::vector<MSLane*>
00167 MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes::getLanePredeccessorLanes(MSLane* l) {
00168     std::string eid = l->getEdge().getID();
00169     // get predecessing edges
00170     const std::vector<MSEdge*> &predEdges = l->getEdge().getIncomingEdges();
00171     std::vector<MSLane*> ret;
00172     // find predecessing lanes
00173     std::vector<MSEdge*>::const_iterator i = predEdges.begin();
00174     for (; i != predEdges.end(); ++i) {
00175         MSEdge* e = *i;
00176         assert(e != 0);
00177         typedef std::vector<MSLane*> LaneVector;
00178         const LaneVector* cl = e->allowedLanes(l->getEdge(), SVC_UNKNOWN);
00179         bool fastAbort = false;
00180         if (cl != 0) {
00181             for (LaneVector::const_iterator j = cl->begin(); !fastAbort && j != cl->end(); j++) {
00182                 const MSLinkCont& lc = (*j)->getLinkCont();
00183                 for (MSLinkCont::const_iterator k = lc.begin(); !fastAbort && k != lc.end(); k++) {
00184                     if ((*k)->getLane() == l) {
00185                         ret.push_back(*j);
00186                         fastAbort = true;
00187                     }
00188                 }
00189             }
00190         }
00191     }
00192     return ret;
00193 }
00194 
00195 
00196 MSE2Collector*
00197 MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes::buildCollector(size_t c, size_t r, MSLane* l,
00198         SUMOReal start, SUMOReal end) {
00199     std::string id = makeID(l->getID(), c, r);
00200     if (start + end < l->getLength()) {
00201         start = l->getLength() - end - (SUMOReal) 0.1;
00202     }
00203     return new MSE2Collector(id, myUsage,
00204                              l, start, end, haltingTimeThresholdM,
00205                              haltingSpeedThresholdM, jamDistThresholdM);
00206 }

00227 void
00228 MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes::writeXMLDetectorProlog(OutputDevice& dev) const {
00229     dev.writeXMLHeader("detector");

00231 
00232 
00233 size_t bla = 0;
00234 
00235 std::string
00236 MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes::makeID(const std::string& baseID ,
00237                                     size_t /*col*/, size_t /*row*/) const {
00238     std::string add;
00239     switch (myUsage) {
00240         case DU_USER_DEFINED:
00241             add = "(u)";
00242             break;
00243         case DU_SUMO_INTERNAL:
00244             add = "(i)";
00245             break;
00246         case DU_TL_CONTROL:
00247             add = "(c)";
00248             break;
00249         default:
00250             break;
00251     }
00252     std::string ret =  baseID + add + toString<size_t>(bla++);
00253     return ret;
00254 }

00259     return myID;
